titles.title: A resolution expressing the thanks of the Senate to the Honorable Robert C. Byrd for his service as President Pro Tempore of the United States Senate and to designate Senator Byrd as President Pro Tempore Emeritus of the United States Senate.

A resolution expressing the thanks of the Senate to the Honorable Robert C. Byrd for his service as President Pro Tempore of the United States Senate and to designate Senator Byrd as President Pro Tempore Emeritus of the United States Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since being introduced in the Senate on January 15, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Expresses the thanks of the Senate to the Honorable Robert C. Byrd for his service as President Pro Tempore of the U.S. Senate. Designates Senator Byrd as President Pro Tempore Emeritus of the U.S. Senate.
